Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back NZ$250 FOOD & BEVERAGE CREDIT ADULTS ONLY RESORT View gallery / Back Pacific Resort Aitutaki - Pool Pacific Resort Aitutaki - aerial view Pacific Resort Aitutaki - beach Pacific Resort Aitutaki - beach Aitutaki Pacific Resort Aitutaki &vert; Return flights • 5 Nights • Transfers • Breakfast Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Aitutaki the crown jewel of the Cook Islands is home to Pacific Resort Aitutaki – a place where time passes slowly and the delights of island life are presented in luxurious surroundings. Start each day with spectacular views of Aitutaki’s world-famous lagoon, thanks to the private sundeck and absolute beachfront location of each of the Resort’s 29 spacious beachfront bungalows and villas. All room categories are tastefully appointed with a modern Pacific influence, boasting luxury amenities. Pacific Resort Aitutaki welcomes guests 12 years and over. View more View less 5 nights + flights, transfers, breakfast & more from $ 4169 per person share twin Flying with Air New Zealand NZ$250 FOOD & BEVERAGE CREDIT ADULTS ONLY RESORT Enquire now Sale Period : until 21 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: Return Economy class (The Works) airfares flying Air New Zealand from Auckland to Rarotonga Add $160 per person return to fly from your nearest Air New Zealand serviced domestic airport Return Economy class airfares from Rarotonga to Aitutaki 5 nights accommodation Return Aitutaki airport transfers Daily a la carte breakfast NZ$250 food and beverage credit per room per stay Tropical welcome drink on arrival to the resort FREE use of kayaks, bicycles, beach towels and sun loungers FREE Wi-Fi Room Types Departs From Auckland Wellington Christchurch from Auckland Premium Beachfront Bungalow Romance begins the moment you enter your Premium Beachfront Bungalow, with stunning lagoon views from your private patio. Perfect for two, it’s a secluded tropical retreat, just steps from the sparkling waters. Auckland 5 night package from $4169 per person share twin Additional nights from $599 per person share twin Travel 14 Jan - 15 Feb 26, 25 Feb - 08 Mar 26 Auckland 5 night package from $5139 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 15 Feb - 14 May 26, 20 May - 31 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 Auckland 5 night package from $5339 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 30 Jun 26, 13 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Wellington 5 night package from $4329 per person share twin Additional nights from $599 per person share twin Travel 14 Jan - 15 Feb 26, 25 Feb - 08 Mar 26 Wellington 5 night package from $5299 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 15 Feb - 14 May 26, 20 May - 31 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 Wellington 5 night package from $5499 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 30 Jun 26, 13 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $4329 per person share twin Additional nights from $599 per person share twin Travel 14 Jan - 15 Feb 26, 25 Feb - 08 Mar 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $5299 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 15 Feb - 14 May 26, 20 May - 31 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $5499 per person share twin Additional nights from $780 per person share twin Travel 01 Jun - 30 Jun 26, 13 Aug - 31 Aug 26 Ultimate Beachfront Villa The Ultimate Beachfront Villa embodies luxury and romance, set high above the crystal-clear Aitutaki lagoon. From this exclusive retreat, immerse yourself in unparalleled views. The seamless combination of timber furnishings and Polynesian décor creates a serene atmosphere, ideal for unwinding while being mesmerized by the breathtaking vistas of the lagoon. Auckland 5 night package from $4749 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 27 Jan - 04 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 10 Mar 26, 13 Mar - 20 Mar 26 Auckland 5 night package from $5999 per person share twin Additional nights from $955 per person share twin Travel 19 Apr - 13 May 26, 21 May - 28 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 Wellington 5 night package from $4909 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 27 Jan - 04 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 10 Mar 26, 13 Mar - 20 Mar 26 Wellington 5 night package from $6159 per person share twin Additional nights from $955 per person share twin Travel 19 Apr - 13 May 26, 21 May - 28 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $4909 per person share twin Additional nights from $705 per person share twin Travel 27 Jan - 04 Feb 26, 26 Feb - 10 Mar 26, 13 Mar - 20 Mar 26 Christchurch 5 night package from $6159 per person share twin Additional nights from $955 per person share twin Travel 19 Apr - 13 May 26, 21 May - 28 May 26, 03 Sep - 20 Sep 26 If the advertised room type doesn't suit, or you'd like to travel outside the advertised dates, please ask us for a customised quote below. Aitutaki sightseeing optional add-ons The Vaka Cruise There is no better way to experience the beauty of Aitutaki than explore the crystal turquoise waters during a lagoon cruise. Hop onboard the Vaka Teariki Moana and enjoy breathtaking lagoon views in a relaxed atmosphere. Visit sunsoaked islets (motus), swim and snorkel in spots teeming with an array of colourful tropical fish and majestic giant trevallies, followed by a delicious island buffet lunch. The Vaka Cruise is simply something that no visitor to Aitutaki should miss! Includes: return hotel transfers, lagoon cruise & BBQ fish lunch Operates: Mon-Sat Duration: 6 hours Price from $319 per adult, $159 per child (5-11yrs) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Bishop’s Lagoon Cruise Explore the eastern side of Aitutaki Lagoon, where you can spot turtles and dive beneath the crystal-clear waters on a snorkelling adventure. Visit the iconic Heaven Sand Bar, then set sail to the lagoon's crown jewel, Onefoot Island. Savor a delicious BBQ lunch at our Hideaway Hut, and spend the rest of the afternoon unwinding, swimming, and basking in the sun. Includes: return hotel transfers, beach towels, snorkelling gear & BBQ lunch on One Foot Island Operates: Mon-Sat Duration: 6 hours Price from $199 per adult, $89 per child (4-11yrs) Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Black Pearl Fishing – Deep Sea Fishing Shared Half Day Charter Start your deep sea fishing adventure within only five minutes of leaving the wharf. The Black Pearl Fishing hosts are on hand to give you friendly, expert advice as you fish for yellowfin tuna, wahoo, giant trevally and more. Includes: return hotel transfers, fishing equipment, food & drinks Operates: Mon-Sat Duration: 4 hours Price from $269 per adult Travel: 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Terms & Conditions Sales to 21 Nov 25 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 03 Nov 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Packages are applicable for new bookings only. Package prices are based on return Economy class (The Works) flying Air New Zealand to Rarotonga from Auckland, Wellington or Christchurch • Flights from Wellington or your nearest Air NZ serviced domestic airport are via Auckland in both directions. Flights from Christchurch are based on the direct flight based on Tuesday/Saturday departure from NZ and Friday/Monday return from Rarotonga. • Travel between Nov-Dec 2025 & Jun-Aug 2026 not valid on NZ945 & NZ946 flights. Upgrades to Premium Economy & Business Premier only valid on the AKL-RAR-AKL sector. • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense. • Day of week surcharges may apply. Airfares are based on the most direct routing but may vary depending on subsequent tax & surcharge increases. • All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Any resort credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & cannot be exchanged for cash. • Food and Beverage credits much be used onsite at their Restaurant and Bar. • Min/max stays apply. • Child costs where advertised are based on up to 2 children 11 years and under sharing accommodation with 2 adults using existing bedding. • Where Kids eat free this is based on 1 child per paying adult up to 2 kids 2-11yrs. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. * FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options. Sightseeing conditions: Prices are valid as at 21 Feb 25, but may vary depending on exchange rates. The price guide shown is a per person from price and is based on low season travel. Travel must be completed by 31 Mar 26 unless otherwise stated, closeout dates may apply. Min/max numbers may apply for tours to operate. Tours and sightseeing are subject to change and additional transfers may be required to connect with tours – these will be an additional cost, please ask your House of Travel consultant.
